segments.text: Yes . We ’ re having a special sale on this machine here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is that a Danish machine ? The name looks Danish .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . It ’ s Swedish . Would you like me to demonstrate it for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . I ’ d like to see how it washes .
segments.speaker: S1
